name: Modern 64-bit
description: Modern 64-bit Garry's Mod server. Better performance and stability.
script_install:
#!/bin/bash
# Garry's Mod (64-bit) Installation Script
cd /tmp
echo "Downloading SteamCMD..."
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamcmd
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steamcmd
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamapps
cd /mnt/server/steamcmd

echo "Installing Garry's Mod (64-bit branch)..."
./steamcmd.sh +force_install_dir /mnt/server +login anonymous +app_update 4020 -beta x86-64 validate +quit || exit 1

echo "Setting up 64-bit libraries..."
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk64
cp -v linux64/steamclient.so /mnt/server/.steam/sdk64/steamclient.so

echo "Installation complete."
